mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, adminno, ntitle, ncontent, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, youtube) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, #{passwd}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{youtube})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, adminno, ntitle, ncontent, passwd, rdate, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, views, youtube FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC

SELECT noticeno, adminno, ntitle, ncontent, passwd, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, views, youtube FROM notice
WHERE ntitle=#{ntitle}
WHERE UPPER(ntitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(ncontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY notice DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM notice
WHERE UPPER(ntitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(ncontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
